commentary: The "VAST [blank]" is a running gag that starts here (I think}, which I can name four total examples off the top of my head. The VAST GLUB (instant troll extinction), the VAST CROAK (a big frog says a huge ribbit when a universe is created), the VAST HONK (Lord English says a loud honk when he's summoned), and the VAST EXPLETIVE (the Sufferer says "fuck" really loud while he's getting crucified for being Troll Jesus).
